trans-unit.source: Represents a set of selected dates in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un set di date selezionate in un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Dates can be added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: Date possono essere aggiunti alla <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, adding a date or a range to the SelectedDatesCollection may cause it to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: In base al valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, l'aggiunta di una data o un intervallo per il SelectedDatesCollection può causarne il da cancellare.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente sono elencati come <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>interessa la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: |CalendarSelectionMode|Effect on SelectedDates| |---------------------------|-----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|No selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: | CalendarSelectionMode | Effetto sul SelectedDates | |---------------------------|-----------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| È consentita alcuna selezione.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>non è possibile impostare e nessun valore possono essere aggiunto a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Può essere selezionata solo una singola data, impostando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>il primo valore in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> o</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> cannot be used.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|A single range of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>non può essere utilizzato. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| È possibile selezionare un singolo intervallo di date.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, aggiunta di una data per <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>singolarmente o tramite <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>eliminerà tutti i valori precedenti da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| È possibile selezionare più intervalli non contiguo di date.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunta di una data singolarmente o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>tramite <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>non cancellerà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>ancora cancellerà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, ma sono quindi possibile aggiungere altre date o intervalli.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.|
trans-unit.target: Aggiunta di un intervallo che include alcune date sono già selezionate o si sovrappone con un altro intervallo comporta l'unione degli intervalli e non genera un'eccezione. |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> associated with this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> associata a questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Adds all the dates in the specified range, which includes the first and last dates, to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge tutte le date nell'intervallo specificato, che include le date e il cognome, alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The first date to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: La prima data da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The last date to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'ultima data da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
